text: Kamaghɨn Esta Hatakɨn diazɨ an a bagha izi. Hatak ana amizibar garir gumazir mam, atrivim faragha Hatak amɨsevegha ghaze, a Estan ingangarim damuam. Hatak izezɨma, Esta anemaga ghaze, nɨ mangɨ nguibar ekiamɨn tiar akamɨn Mordekai batogh. Egh an azaragh deragh fogh, a manmaghsua arazir kabagh ami?
